LanguageData.Shell_USBlightFoam.label: Blight killer shell
LanguageData.Shell_USBlightFoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with blight killer liquid. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_USBlightFoam.label: Blight killer shell
LanguageData.Shell_USFilthFoam.label: Filth detergant shell
LanguageData.Shell_USFilthFoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with active detergant. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_USFilthFoam.label: Filth killer shell
LanguageData.Shell_USInsectFoam.label: Insect killer shell
LanguageData.Shell_USInsectFoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with insect killer foam. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_USInsectFoam.label: Insect killer shell
LanguageData.TrapIED_USInsectfoam.label: IED Insect Killer trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_USInsectfoam.description: A pair of insect killer shells connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
LanguageData.Shell_USPlantFoam.label: Plant killer shell
LanguageData.Shell_USPlantFoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with plant killer foam. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_USPlantFoam.label: Plant killer shell
